sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.WF_ClientAjaxUtils</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>WF_ClientAjaxUtils</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var WF_ClientAjaxUtils = Class.create();
WF_ClientAjaxUtils.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

	fetchCostCenter : function(){
		var retObj = {};
		var auNumber= this.getParameter('sysparm_au_num');
		var auName = this.getParameter('sysparm_au_name');
		var grCostCenter = new GlideRecord('cmn_cost_center');
		//account_number=0076012^name=ATM EXPENSE - REGIONAL BANKING TOPSIDE
		grCostCenter.addEncodedQuery('account_number='+auNumber+'^name='+auName);
		grCostCenter.setLimit(1);
		grCostCenter.query();
		if(grCostCenter.next()){
			retObj = {
				sysId : grCostCenter.getUniqueValue(),
				auName : grCostCenter.getValue('name'),
				auNumber : grCostCenter.getValue('account_number')
			};
		}
		return JSON.stringify(retObj);
	},

	fetchCompCode : function () {

		var retObj = {};
		var compCode = this.getParameter('sysparm_comp_code');
		var grCompanyCode = new GlideRecord('sn_wsd_core_company_code');
		grCompanyCode.addEncodedQuery('u_code='+compCode);
		grCompanyCode.setLimit(1);
		grCompanyCode.query();
		if (grCompanyCode.next()){

			retObj = {
				compSysId : grCompanyCode.getUniqueValue(),
				compName : grCompanyCode.getValue('u_name'),
				compCode : grCompanyCode.getValue('u_code')
			};
		}

		return JSON.stringify(retObj);

	},

	fetchBuildingDetails : function () {

		var retObj = {};
		var buildId = this.getParameter('sysparm_build_id');
		var grBuilding = new GlideRecord('sn_wsd_core_building');
		if (grBuilding.get(buildId)){
			retObj = {
				region : grBuilding.getValue('region'),
				site : grBuilding.getValue('site'),
				campus : grBuilding.getValue('campus')
			};
		}
		return JSON.stringify(retObj);

	},

    type: 'WF_ClientAjaxUtils'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>K105800</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2024-01-05 00:52:12</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>16ae0c6593e735909ab4f84e1dba103f</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>WF_ClientAjaxUtils</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="">a1bd5de60f751010784dd2d92f767e96</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="">a1bd5de60f751010784dd2d92f767e96</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_16ae0c6593e735909ab4f84e1dba103f</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2024-02-04 17:23:04</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
